On January 29, social activist Anna Hazare announced that he would go on a hunger strike in support of protesting farmers starting January 30. Following a discussion with former Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis and Union Minister of State for Agriculture Kailash Chaudhary, he decided against the fast.

A picture of the activist with BJP President JP Nadda is now circulating on social media. The image shows Hazare purportedly wearing a BJP scarf. Several people have claimed that he joined the BJP in the presence of Nadda.

A user with the handle @iAnnaHaare tweeted the picture and wrote, “In the presence of Honorable Shri JP Nadda, I joined the Bharatiya Janata Party today!!” The tweet racked up over 1,500 retweets and 7,700 likes at the time of writing. (Archive link)
माननीय श्री जेपी नड्डा की मौजूदगी में आज भारतीय जनता पार्टी की सदस्यता ग्रहण की!! pic.twitter.com/R5ctt0dOaR
— Anna Hazare (@iAnnaHaare) January 29, 2021
A Facebook page named ‘Mein Congress Hun’ also shared the photo and accompanying claim.
The image is being shared widely on Twitter and Facebook with similar claims.

A closer look at the image reveals that it has been morphed. There is a clear distinction between Hazare’s face and neck. His face has been edited onto the body of the person who was in the original picture.
The picture also has a watermark of @AnnaHaare. The name of this handle was recently changed to @iAnnaHaare.
This slideshow requires JavaScript.
Alt News performed a reverse image search and found this picture in a Navbharat Times story dated June 25, 2020, that shows Jyotiraditya Scindia.
According to an Economic Times article from March 12, 2020, Scindia joined the BJP on March 11, 2020. He resigned from Congress on March 9, 2020 and became a member of the BJP two days later.

Watch | “This is a very democratic party where every individual gets a say… #JyotiradityaMScindia will get the opportunity too”: BJP’s JP Nadda welcomes him to the party#jyotiradityamscindia #MadhyaPradeshCrisis #MPPoliticalCrisis pic.twitter.com/q3Cp5GQa4z
— NDTV (@ndtv) March 11, 2020

After performing a reverse image search using Yandex, we found a number of links from 2011, with the earliest version of Anna Hazare’s picture dating back to April 2011. This photo continues to be used as a file photo by media organisations.

Alt News performed an advanced search on Twitter using epoch time. We were able to find that the picture was first tweeted by @iAnnaHaare on January 29, 2021, at 10:38 PM. @iAnnaHaare is a parody account that changes its username from time to time. Earlier, this account was named @AnnaHaare and prior to this, it was called @TikaitNaresh before it was changed to @AnnaHaare.
This slideshow requires JavaScript.

Therefore, a picture of Jyotiraditya Scindia joining the BJP was morphed with Anna Hazare’s face to show that the activist has joined the BJP. No such development has been reported as of this writing.

At Alt News since 2019, she focuses on authentication of information which includes visual verification, media misreports, examining mis/disinformation across social media. She is the lead video producer at Alt News and manages social media accounts for the organization.
